summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Section 1 of Ordinance 112755 to include the Transit Fund and the Westlake fund and eliminate the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle as funding sources to reimburse the Emergency Fund for the appropriation authorized in Ordinance 112755 for final design of a new, permanent monorail station, construction of the temporary monorail station and demolition of the existing monorail station; and making appropriations therefor.
